title: Why didn\'t the reporter of Port city Foodies on 1/15 for the \new\" Hot Pink Cake Stand on Front St.list the phone number and hours of business? If a customer wanted to stop by & visit this great sounding new dessert place some obvious info is missing. Can this this provided? I would think the owner want want this as well."
text:
The
Twitter link is in the Port City Foodies blog:

http://twitter.com/hotpinkcake
